column5: happy new year all,  like most i was really busy this holiday season, lots of last min errands and stuff to do before taking off to new jersey for christmas. i did however manage to find some time to hit the waters before 2011 rolled through. i wish all of you a great upcoming year and fishing season!  here are some pics from my last couple outings of 2010, enjoy
Those are some excellent pictures, well done  Joey
Great photos  Question ?  Do the running shoes grip the ice better than the felt bottom wading boots ?
Great pics as usual Mark. It's gotta be the olympus   gotta go find some open water myself too ... itching for a few drifts

thanks guys, the olympus is great victor. still tanking everything i put it through ahha.  and for the shoes well, i dont like wading boots cause most of them get really heavy when wet and i dont like how hard boots are on my feet. the shoes that i wear are very comfy and feel like im not even wearing them. as for the grip, i having taking any falls on them yet so i cant really say. although i did just trek down into the niagara gorge with them no prob.
Awesome way to end the year Thanks for sharing l2p Leechman
